name: Etherlords 2
summary: Come back to the World of the Lords in thefantastic sequel, Etherlords 2. New realms offer fantastic possibilities in this exciting mix of role-playing and tactical, turn-based combat found in the great traditions of fantasy trading card games.
info:
• 中文名: 苍穹霸主2
  • 开发: Nival Inc
  • 发行: Nival Inc
  • 平台: PC
  • 发行日期: 2003年9月12日
  • 官方网站: https://en.nival.com/games/pc-games/etherlords-2
